text:
Fans noticed the reality star dad attending a concert this past weekend. The account that shared the photos wrote, "Anyone see this? It’s Tyler at a concert last night. Is that Cate's friend?"

A comedy parody account for Teen Mom 2 star Jenelle Evans wrote, "YOU HAVE BEEN CAUGHT .....Care to explain ..... !?"

And Tyler fired back, "Omg are you people serious!? Caught doing what? Talking to a 50 year old grandma who is a fan of the show? Yeah I guess I’m 'busted' lol."

Adding, "You people just refuse to believe in a faithful relationship. Just because you have never experienced one, doesn’t mean it’s not real."

But this isn't the first time that Tyler had to put a rest cheating accusations. The reality star fired back at Crazy Days and Nights weeks ago after a blind item claimed he has been unfaithful.

As previously reported, Catelynn checked back into a rehab in mid-January for a six-week program. And luckily, her husband is supporting her every step of the way.

A source told RadarOnline.com, “Ty said that they both know how long the road is ahead of them but they’re ready." Adding, "They’re completely in love and fully committed to getting better in every aspect, both of them. Ty said once Cate is out of treatment and in a better place they’ll focus on having another kid. A happy ending is what they’re after.”
title: Tyler Baltierra SLAMS Cheating Rumors After A SHOCKING Photo Of Him With Another Woman Surfaces
